summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3481, for the improvement of Boylston Avenue North, from 120 feet north of East Newton Street to Franklin Avenue; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues all in the City of Seattle, under Ordinance No. 43228 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
